name: Canvas Clock
tagline: Movable , Resizable, not that bad looking .. Canvas Clock. Tick :)
body:
Well , Its a Clock. A plain , old looking, Simple Clock ( with hands ofcourse). It's easy to configure and use , really. add this to your html `
.... ` and this is sufficient for clock to get started on your screen. For more custom options, you can configure the clock by following parameters. `new Clock({ dimensions: 200, // clock will be dimension x dimension in size needles: { // object to customize the hand length for all three hands minutes: 75, hour: 60, seconds: 80 }, img: "numbers_b" // custom image to use in the background });` After that, just enjoy your clock. See you another "TIME" :)
